description:
The investment seeks to replicate investment results that generally correspond to the Inspire Global Hope Large Cap Index.
 The fund will invest at least 80% of its total assets in the component securities of the index. The index provider selects foreign and domestic equity securities included in the Russell 1,000 Index, MSCI EAFE Index, and MSCI EM Large Cap Index using the index provider's Inspire Impact Score®, a proprietary selection methodology that is designed to assign a score to a particular security based on the security's alignment with biblical values and the positive impact that company has on the world through various ESG criterion.
